itemDescription: British landscape painter, etcher and printmaker (1805-1881)

wikipedia_page.main: Samuel Palmer  Hon.RE (Hon. Fellow of the Society of Painter-Etchers) (27 January 1805 – 24 May 1881) was a British landscape painter, etcher and printmaker. He was also a prolific writer. Palmer was a key figure in Romanticism in Britain and produced visionary pastoral paintings.
